reviewText:
My 3-year old loves this one and asks to watch it constantly.  Each of the episodes are very entertaining, but based on the number of times I've viewed them in the last week alone, the thought of a "Puppy Clifford" request makes me want to claw my own eyes out.  It's not Clifford's fault...

I highly recommend this one for all "Puppy Clifford" lovers.  Just make sure you buy a second DVD so you can rotate them every so often!!
I got this for my granddaughter for her birthday,  she loves Clifford.
My son absolutely loves clifford so when i saw this i thought it would a nice change for him since its Clifford in his Puppy years.  My son has watched this non stop every day.
We have two special needs boys who absolutely love Clifford. They really get into puppy days now and are enjoying them.
This is one of my son's favorite Clifford DVDs. He watches it over and over. He loves it! I highly recommend.
My daughter loves the Clifford tv show and has really enjoyed this video.  Item arrived in great shape and in plenty of time for Christmas.
Forgot the kids...I love this video!  Clifford is so cute!  The kids just want to watch this one over and over.

My Granddaughter absolutely loves this DVD, it is one of her favorites.

Highly Recommended!
My 3 year old son LOVES Clifford as a puppy, even more so than Clifford the Big Red Dog.  He watches this DVD over and over.  Teaches kindness and compassion.
